projects.name: Secret access Project
projects.description: Engineered a robust authentication system utilizing Node.js and middleware architecture that improved user access security by 40%, significantly decreasing unauthorized access attempts and enhancing overall platform integrity. Utilized Node.js for server-side logic and efficient request handling. Created a robust user authentication flow, including login, registration, and password hashing.

projects.name: Enhancing Crop Disease detection
projects.description: Developed a model using kaggle dataset for enhancing crop yield. Implemented a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) architecture for image processing and analysis. Designed the neural network using tf.keras.models.Sequential for a streamlined model architecture.

experiences.description: Successfully completed weekly projects, demonstrating practical skills in React.js. Covered topics such as component architecture, state management, and UI design. Demonstrated proficiency in front-end development and problem-solving.

Published Newsletter for whole college giving info about the recent advancement in the technical world. Hosted an AWS workshop event which impacted 500+ students and resulted in 30% more participation in the club. Spearheaded various tech events aim to educate 600+ freshers which clarified their choice of domain. Organized Web development workshop and got footfall of 150+.

full_output.name: VEDANT PORWAL
achievements_and_awards: Awarded Deans list for excellence in Academics in 5th semester.
